1: <pb/><t>Ob'iltac ex, ex satumel anima, ex ixtum anima. Malaj mach tzex sataneli, ma tzex ixtani. Ayic ol lajvoc e satanel eb', tzeyixtanpax eb', ol ex satjoqueloc, ol ex ixtajpaxoc.</t>
2: <t>Mamin Jehová, oc'oc val a c'ol d'ayon̈, yipc'olal aj cuuj. Ochan̈ qued'oc d'a junjun c'u ayic ay co yaelal, tzon̈ a colani.</t>
3: <t>Ayic syab'an eb' anima to scot oval, sb'at eb' elelal. Ayic tzach javi on̈ a colo', sacleminac sb'at juntzan̈ chon̈ab' elelal.</t>
4: <t>Icha val tz'aj satanel avb'en noc' c'ulub', icha chi' ol aj satjiel sb'eyumal eb' cajc'ool.</t>
5: <t>Mamin Jehová, nivan ton val elc'ochi, cajan ach d'a satchaan̈. A ach ol ic'b'ey eb' aj Sion d'a vach'ilal yed' d'a stojolal.</t>
6: <t>Ol ac' stec'anil eb', sjelanil yed' yaj pensaril eb'. A juntzan̈ chi' ol colan eb'. Axo yic ol ach sc'anab'ajan eb', ichato sb'eyumal eb' ol ajoc.</t>
7: <t>Ab'ec val yel yav eb' soldado d'a yoltac scalleal e chon̈ab' yuj xivelal. Ab'ec val yel yav eb' xid'naquec' sc'an junc'olal.</t>
8: <t>A juntzan̈ b'e, ix laj can tz'inan, man̈xa mach tz'ec' d'ay yuj xivelal. Ix juvib'at strato eb' ix yac'a'. Ix paticajel eb' ix xid'ec' sb'o trato chi', man̈xa mach ay yelc'ochi.</t>
9: <t>Ix cuscanq'ue lum luum, ix juvicanb'at yilji luum. Ix q'uixvicanq'ue lum Líbano, yujto ix ch'acjiel ste'al luum. Axo lum pan̈an yic Sarón, ix ochcan lum tz'inan lumal, axo lum Basán yed' lum vitzal Carmelo, ix can san̈an luum.</t>
10: <t>Yuj chi' syal Jehová icha tic: A ticnaic jun, ol in q'ue vaan, ol in ch'oxaneli to te nivan in poder.</t>
11: <t>A tas nab'il eyuuj yed' tas toxo ix e b'o'o, lajan icha c'alem, ma icha an̈ ac. Ol in pub'at vic' d'ay, ol tz'ab'at smasanil.</t>
12: <t>A e chon̈ab', taan̈xon̈ej ol ajcanoc, ol scha sc'ac'al icha stz'ab'at te' taquin̈ q'uiix.</t>
13: <t>Mach ex najat ayex yed' ex lac'an ayex, ilecnab' val tastac ix in c'ulej, scham val eyojtacanel in poder, xchi Jehová.</t>
14: <t>A eb' chuc sb'eyb'al ay d'a Sion, tz'ib'xi eb' yuj xivelal. A eb' malaj yelc'och Dios d'ay, tz'ib'xi eb', syalan eb' icha tic: A yoval sc'ol Dios, lajan icha jun c'ac' man̈xa b'aq'uin̈ stupi. ¿Tom ayto junoc on̈ ol yal co colchaji? xchi eb'.</t>
15: <t>A eb' ol colchajoc: Aton eb' sb'eyb'alan tojolal, eb' an̈ej yel syala', eb' malaj sgana tz'och b'eyumal yuj schaan tumin d'a elc'altac, eb' max yac'och sb'a yuj schamel junoc anima, syic'anpaxel sb'a eb' d'a scal chucal.</t>
16: <t>Aton eb' chi' ol colchajoc, malaj tas ol sna eb', ichato cajanec' eb' d'a junoc chon̈ab' vach' yajoch smuroal, ayn̈ej tas ol sva eb' yed' tas ol yuq'uej eb'.</t>
17: <t>Ayic ol eyilan jun Rey te ay stziquiquial, ol eyilpaxi to te najat ol c'och smacb'en jun nación tic,</t>
18: <t>ol e naancoti tas ajnac e xiv d'a yalan̈taxo, ol eyalan icha tic: ¿Tas ix sc'ulej eb' vin̈ ch'oc nacional sc'ananel q'uen tumin d'ayon̈? ¿Tas ix sc'ulej eb' vin̈ tz'echtan q'uen tumin chi'? ¿Tas ix sc'ulej eb' vin̈ slaj b'isan juntzan̈ yed'tal eb' soldado yuj snaan eb' jantac sb'eyumal co chon̈ab'? xe chama.</t>
19: <t>Man̈xa b'aq'uin̈ ol eyil eb' ac'umtac d'a e cal, eb' ch'oc nacional ch'oc tial syala', max eyab' tas syal eb'.</t>
20: <t>Ol eyil chon̈ab' Sion, b'aj scac'taxonoch q'uin̈, aton Jerusalén, jun chon̈ab' b'aj junc'olal ol on̈ ajoc. Man̈xa b'aq'uin̈ ol q'uexmajoc. Icha junoc mantiado scann̈ej, max chocjiq'ueta yestacail, max d'in̈chaj junoc sch'an̈al, icha chi' ol ajoc.</t>
21: <t>Ata' ol sch'ox sb'a Jehová d'ayon̈ yed' spoder. Tzijtum a a' levan sat ol b'ey ta', palta man̈ ol yal yoch eb' ajc'ol yed' snivac barco yac'an oval qued'oc.</t>
22: <t>A sch'an̈al juntzan̈ barco chi', man̈ ol toc'joc tzatzb'oc d'a yoyal, man̈xa b'aj ol yac' yip sch'an̈al sc'apaquil. Ol pojchajec' tastac ay d'a eb' ajc'ol chi', ipan eb' tz'em sb'ey ol ic'an jab'oc yico', yujto a Jehová ol on̈ colanoc. A' ol b'oanel tas caji, co Reyal pax yaji.</t>
24: <t>Malaj junoc mach cajan d'a Jerusalén tic ol alanoc: Penaay in, man̈ xchioc. A eb' cajan d'a jun chon̈ab' tic, ol ic'joquel smul eb'.</t>
